{"id": "C97-Pj4WDr", "type": "block", "props": {"alt": "", "fit": "contain", "url": "//r.yidooo.com/user/2baccbc3-6bad-464c-a430-d10b1790e443/2026-01-15/img/1768443533838_flowlamboh0928_Anime_style_watercolor_painting_exquisite_detail_f7f5b874-948a-45e9-a5b5-8136bc2cd450.png", "xywh": "[16945.32682786164,10699.53939213439,400,266.1758241758242]", "align": "center", "error": false, "index": "a0", "scale": 1, "title": {"delta": [], "$blocksuite:internal:text$": true}, "ossKey": "user/2baccbc3-6bad-464c-a430-d10b1790e443/2026-01-15/img/1768443533838_flowlamboh0928_Anime_style_watercolor_painting_exquisite_detail_f7f5b874-948a-45e9-a5b5-8136bc2cd450.png", "prompt": "", "rotate": 0, "slotId": "image-4a0ywcy7", "caption": {"delta": [], "$blocksuite:internal:text$": true}, "autoSize": false, "funcType": "upload", "minWidth": 400, "minHeight": 232, "lockedBySelf": false, "meta:bizNodeId": "", "keepAspectRatio": true}, "flavour": "yidooo:image", "version": 1}

{"id": "DGOf5YEqin", "type": "block", "props": {"xywh": "[16058.025027475605,7920.306678110242,1808.6942946006784,1068.6310540518318]", "color": {"dark": "#ffffff", "light": "#000000"}, "index": "a7", "scale": 1.4800984568123654, "rotate": 0, "markdown": "1. From "Absolute Silhouette" to "Exquisite Anime Character Design"
   Original Video: Characters are presented as pure black silhouettes, entirely devoid of facial features, defined only by glowing outlines. This approach emphasizes "divinity" and "mystery."
   Your Recreation: You replaced the solid black shapes by restoring intricate facial details. We can clearly see the character's eyes, the bridge of the nose, skin tones, and the structural shadows of the face.
   Visual Effect: The imagery transitions from a "symbolic piece of art" into a "soulful anime character close-up," offering much stronger emotional expression and a sense of narrative.
2. From "Liquid Light" to "Extreme Impasto & Heavy Color Texture"
   Original Video: The hair and decorations possess a smoothness similar to liquid metal or glowing silk. The lighting and shadows are exceptionally clean and minimalist.
   Your Recreation: You introduced distinct brushstroke textures and extreme impasto (thick paint) effects. The hair is no longer a singular glowing mass but features layers of interwoven lines. The clothing and background patterns exhibit a heavy, stacked texture reminiscent of "Iwa-enogu" (mineral pigment painting) or "heavy gold-leaf" styles.
   Visual Effect: The visuals appear more dense and luxurious, conveying a handcrafted artistic quality rather than a purely digital, motion-graphics feel.
3. Concretization and Narrativity of Background Elements
   Original Video: The background consists primarily of pure mathematical geometric circles (Mandalas), using rotation to create a sense of space.
   Your Recreation: You replaced the simple circles with more complex elements such as "clockwork gears," "star tracks," and "shattered crystals." Some shots even incorporate structures like "angel wings."
   Visual Effect: The dimension of the scene is expanded. The background is no longer just decorative but suggests narrative themes such as "Time," "Fate," or a "Divine Outburst."
4. Expansion of Color Dimensions (From Bicolor to Multi-tonal Gradients)
   Original Video: Limited to extreme blacks and ultra-bright golds/whites.
   Your Recreation: You added neutral tones and environmental colors (such as dark browns, beiges, and even cool-toned shadows) to the black-and-gold base. Light refraction on the hair and skin creates more layered and sophisticated transitions.
   Visual Effect: The image becomes softer and more voluminous, reducing the "harsh" impact of the original in exchange for a more durable and captivating "atmospheric beauty."
5. Texture Substitution: Introducing "Glazed Glass" and "Heavy Metalwork"
   Original Video: Leans toward the expression of "light beams" and "energy bodies."
   Your Recreation: The scenes feature textures resembling glazed glass refraction and intricate metal filigree (hollowed carving).
   Visual Effect: This creates a "Heavy Industrial Anime" luxury, very similar to the high-end character trailers (PVs) seen in top-tier games like Genshin Impact or Honkai: Star Rail.", "fontStyle": "normal", "textAlign": "left", "fontFamily": "blocksuite:surface:Inter", "fontWeight": "400", "hasMaxWidth": true, "lockedBySelf": false}, "flavour": "affine:edgeless-text", "version": 1, "children": [{"id": "u5mDLeQZAU", "type": "block", "props": {"text": {"delta": [{"insert": "From "Absolute Silhouette" to "Exquisite Anime Character Design"
Original Video: Characters are presented as pure black silhouettes, entirely devoid of facial features, defined only by glowing outlines. This approach emphasizes "divinity" and "mystery."
Your Recreation: You replaced the solid black shapes by restoring intricate facial details. We can clearly see the character's eyes, the bridge of the nose, skin tones, and the structural shadows of the face.
Visual Effect: The imagery transitions from a "symbolic piece of art" into a "soulful anime character close-up," offering much stronger emotional expression and a sense of narrative."}], "$blocksuite:internal:text$": true}, "type": "numbered", "order": 1, "checked": false, "collapsed": false}, "flavour": "affine:list", "version": 1, "children": []}, {"id": "652934wIVb", "type": "block", "props": {"text": {"delta": [{"insert": "From "Liquid Light" to "Extreme Impasto & Heavy Color Texture"
Original Video: The hair and decorations possess a smoothness similar to liquid metal or glowing silk. The lighting and shadows are exceptionally clean and minimalist.
Your Recreation: You introduced distinct brushstroke textures and extreme impasto (thick paint) effects. The hair is no longer a singular glowing mass but features layers of interwoven lines. The clothing and background patterns exhibit a heavy, stacked texture reminiscent of "Iwa-enogu" (mineral pigment painting) or "heavy gold-leaf" styles.
Visual Effect: The visuals appear more dense and luxurious, conveying a handcrafted artistic quality rather than a purely digital, motion-graphics feel."}], "$blocksuite:internal:text$": true}, "type": "numbered", "order": 2, "checked": false, "collapsed": false}, "flavour": "affine:list", "version": 1, "children": []}, {"id": "S48erPRmOF", "type": "block", "props": {"text": {"delta": [{"insert": "Concretization and Narrativity of Background Elements
Original Video: The background consists primarily of pure mathematical geometric circles (Mandalas), using rotation to create a sense of space.
Your Recreation: You replaced the simple circles with more complex elements such as "clockwork gears," "star tracks," and "shattered crystals." Some shots even incorporate structures like "angel wings."
Visual Effect: The dimension of the scene is expanded. The background is no longer just decorative but suggests narrative themes such as "Time," "Fate," or a "Divine Outburst.""}], "$blocksuite:internal:text$": true}, "type": "numbered", "order": 3, "checked": false, "collapsed": false}, "flavour": "affine:list", "version": 1, "children": []}, {"id": "rJjyIPoVEE", "type": "block", "props": {"text": {"delta": [{"insert": "Expansion of Color Dimensions (From Bicolor to Multi-tonal Gradients)
Original Video: Limited to extreme blacks and ultra-bright golds/whites.
Your Recreation: You added neutral tones and environmental colors (such as dark browns, beiges, and even cool-toned shadows) to the black-and-gold base. Light refraction on the hair and skin creates more layered and sophisticated transitions.
Visual Effect: The image becomes softer and more voluminous, reducing the "harsh" impact of the original in exchange for a more durable and captivating "atmospheric beauty.""}], "$blocksuite:internal:text$": true}, "type": "numbered", "order": 4, "checked": false, "collapsed": false}, "flavour": "affine:list", "version": 1, "children": []}, {"id": "KsTbOHdnES", "type": "block", "props": {"text": {"delta": [{"insert": "Texture Substitution: Introducing "Glazed Glass" and "Heavy Metalwork"
Original Video: Leans toward the expression of "light beams" and "energy bodies."
Your Recreation: The scenes feature textures resembling glazed glass refraction and intricate metal filigree (hollowed carving).
Visual Effect: This creates a "Heavy Industrial Anime" luxury, very similar to the high-end character trailers (PVs) seen in top-tier games like Genshin Impact or Honkai: Star Rail."}], "$blocksuite:internal:text$": true}, "type": "numbered", "order": 5, "checked": false, "collapsed": false}, "flavour": "affine:list", "version": 1, "children": []}]}

{"id": "H7tWeGIylJ", "type": "block", "props": {"xywh": "[10666.650625973965,8654.843610525217,2038.5657322483785,159.44659117863853]", "color": {"dark": "#ffffff", "light": "#000000"}, "index": "a5", "scale": 1.0489906303404954, "rotate": 0, "markdown": "### 2. The Artistic Charm of "Divinity" and "Negative Space"

* The Power of Silhouettes: By keeping the characters in silhouette without facial features, the video utilizes "Negative Space." This leaves infinite room for the audience's 
  imagination—every viewer can project their own version of a perfect, divine being onto the character.
* Sacred Geometry: The frequent use of rotating mandalas, circular halos, and star charts taps into "Sacred Geometry." these shapes provide a sense of divine order and 
  epic scale, creating a mythological atmosphere that feels both ancient and futuristic.", "fontStyle": "normal", "textAlign": "left", "fontFamily": "blocksuite:surface:Inter", "fontWeight": "400", "hasMaxWidth": true, "lockedBySelf": false}, "flavour": "affine:edgeless-text", "version": 1, "children": [{"id": "XjRsEvPYIR", "type": "block", "props": {"text": {"delta": [{"insert": "2.
